result.execSummary:
The defendant Ronald A Victory was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Bail applied to costs.  Paid in full.  Any remaining bail to be refunded to poster.

Huber with standard release conditions.
Consecutive to: to any other sentence.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald A Victory

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Ronald A Victory in court, in custody, with attorney Carl William Chesshir.   Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant pleads guilty to count #1 with the repeater struck.  Court finds the defendant guilty of count #1.  State makes recommendations.  Attorney Chesshir makes statements.  Defendant makes statements. 
The Court Orders the Following:  Count #1. 
Sentence of:
20 Days Huber with STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS Consecutive to any other sentence.  (Credit - 0 days).  Defendant is currently in custody on other cases.  
COSTS:  $243.00 Bail to be applied. 
DNA previously done.

ADDRESS INFO for Ronald A Victory
Current: C/O Waukesha County Jail,   (Effective: 02-05-2016)
Prior: W232n6023 Waukesha Ave Apt 5, Sussex, WI 53089

Defendant Ronald A Victory in court with attorney Carl William Chesshir.  Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Next date is the deadline to file motions.  Discovery received from the State in Court.  Hearing scheduled for February 5, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ronald A Victory in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court orders defendant to go to the public defenders office immediately after court.  Hearing scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  Defendant not to discuss the case with the co-defendant.   Defendant to report/comply with Wisconsin Community Services Pretrial Supervision Program.  Defendant to report within the first business day after posting bail or released from custody.

Defendant Ronald A Victory in court, in custody.  Attorney Morin appears and indicates the defendant is intending to seek counsel.  District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises of right to an attorney.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
